newsitem.title: USA: Micro Warehouse names Wayne Garten CFO.
newsitem.headline: Micro Warehouse names Wayne Garten CFO.

text.p: Micro Warehouse Inc, which last year said it would restate its 1994 and 1995 financial statements due to accounting errors, said Friday it appointed Wayne Garten senior vice president and chief financial officer.
Garten will replace Steve Purcell as CFO. In November, the company said Purcell and Chief Accounting Officer Eric Furman resigned.
Micro Warehouse said Garten will manage its finance, accounting, tax, treasury and corporate planning functions.
Garten will join Micro Warehouse February 17. His last position was as CFO of Hanover Direct Inc.
Company spokeswoman Melinda LeVino declined to speculate when Micro Warehouse's financial statements will be restated.
"They are being worked on and will be released as soon as they are completed," she said.
